My Header

"`

2020-11-11T04:06:46,851+00:00.content: i also found that using gethtmlrow was super slow so i had to ditch classes and do it all minimally on the page js file. I had to parse twice and set an array of strings, first pass for the last couple table items and one for indexing. It came out much faster

2020-11-11T04:07:11,873+00:00.content: also, use regex heavily, its a life saver when it comes to extracting data

2020-11-11T04:09:26,199+00:00.content: a cool tip is the format (?<variable>*regex here*  ) you can extract the match as a variable with the match() function
